tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been suffering from pain in lower molar wisdom tooth for 1 week. Hence I visited Gold dental care and Dr Lawrence gave me the exact issue outline and decision was made for wisdom tooth extraction. Dr shankar was performed the surgery. post surgery I had some discomfort with pus formation which was unexpected. So Everyone took full care inch by inch and cleared my problem. I really want to thank the Female doctor (Forgot her name) who addressed and took care everyday and she understood my prob and gave me enough support till I feel better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was honestly scared of the treatment process and the hospitals I have visited before made me more anxious! But thankfully it wasn't the same with Dr.Prem Alex Lawrence. He explained the treatment process clearly and also kindly answered & solved all my queries! The surgery is half done now...Hopefully the rest of the process will go well too. Thank you to the doctors & nurses for your amazing services & guidance  & support.
reply_text: Thanks so much madam for your kind words!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** **** **** ******** ** *** ** **** ***** ** *** ****** ********** ***** I am writing this review with full satisfaction after had a several consultations in recent times.

Those who have a good attitude and being a nice human being in the real-life world then I foresee that they will keep wining towards the great success. Dr. Prem is one among in this group. Basically, he treats all his patients with very polite, patient friendly, highly approachable, transparency, highly skilled professional, assured satisfaction etc. He thoroughly spent his time during in the dental practice and learnt medical science and technology very well.

Dr. Prem is equally doing well in the hospital management system by his incredible leadership skills. As a quick conclusion, I strongly recommend this doctor as a one-stop solution for all our dental problems. 

Thank you Sir for your excellent service and I am sure you have sacrificed your personal time/things to get this reward!!!
My Best Wishes.
reply_text:
Dear Sir

Thank you so much for this exhaustive review. It means a lot and it was a pleasure treating you. 

Thanks for all the kind words. Keeps us super motivated!!!

review: We visited hospital with problems of tooth decay, missing teeth for my husband. Doctor advised us that it is good to go for multiple implants retaining the natural teeth.  The treatment was more professional.  Multiple implants treatment was given under sleeping sedation.  My husband didn't know any pain.  Now ceramic crowns are fixed and we could not believe to see my husband smiling with full of teeth looking so natural.  We and our family are grateful to Doctor Sir and his Team members for their kindness to bring back smile and happiness to my husband.  May God bless Doctor Sir and his Team members.  May their service reach more and more people.
